# lambda Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "lambdalabs" {
  # can set the api_key here or use env LAMBDA_API_KEY
  api_key = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Lambda API key to use
